etymology.description: 人(人) (rén, "person") – a side view of a standing man, highlighting an arm and a leg.
etymology.interpretation: This character intuitively represents a person through a side view silhouette, emphasizing the human form.

examples.chinese: 你是一个好人(你好的人)
examples.pinyin: nǐ shì yī gè hǎo rén

examples.chinese: 每个人都很重要(每個人都很重要)
examples.pinyin: měi gè rén dōu hěn zhòng yào

examples.chinese: 人们普遍感到疲惫(人們普遍感到疲憊)
examples.pinyin: rén men pǔ biàn gǎn dào pí bèi
